name: Pigeon Nest
description: The Pigeon Nest is a cozy, little alcove perched high up on an old oak tree in the city park. It's meticulously crafted with various small twigs, leaves, and brimming with the hustle-bustle of the urban wildlife that's always a stone's throw away. A sanctuary in the midst of the city's chaos, this is the place Penny Pigeon calls home. From the nest, one can overlook the sprawling cityscape that stretches out endlessly dotted with buildings, traffic, people and somewhere in that mess, the coveted land of plenty - Costco.

travel_descriptions.east: Leaving the comfy confines of the Pigeon Nest, Penny Pigeon stretches her wings and takes flight, soaring over the urban jungle towards the distant, bustling Costco Parking Lot to the east.
travel_descriptions.down: Leaving the cozy nest high in the old oak tree, Penny Pigeon takes a gentle downward glide, her wings guiding her to her desired destination - the safe landing of the food court observatory on the Costco Roof.
travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the comfort of the Pigeon Nest, you take flight towards the west, navigating through the sprawling cityscape until you find yourself sneaking into the bustling Costco Food Court, in a quest to find the leftover pizza.

Nest View.name: Nest View
Nest View.description: An expansive view overlooking the city from the pigeon's nest
Nest View.examine_text: From the nest, you can see the whole city spreading out in every direction. The bustling city streets, the towering buildings, and the distant Costco. It's a breathtaking sight.

Sparrow the Speedy.name: Sparrow the Speedy
Sparrow the Speedy.description: Sparrow, a small bird with a quick frame and an even quicker mind, is a constant presence in the Pigeon Nest. She has an unparalleled ability to dart through the trees at great speeds, making her a valuable guide in and around the city.
Sparrow the Speedy.persona: They call me Sparrow. No one is faster in flight or sharper in wit. I can get you anywhere within the city in a jiffy.
Sparrow the Speedy.goal: To assist Penny with speedy delivery of food and rapid getaways when escaping is necessary.

Forest Map.name: Forest Map
Forest Map.description: A detailed map of the forest and city, essential for quick navigation.
Forest Map.examine_text: The map is meticulously drawn on soft, weather-resistant parchment. It details the forest with its vibrant echo-system and architectural blueprint of the city, complete with shortcut routes and escape passages.

Turbo Seeds.name: Turbo Seeds
Turbo Seeds.description: Seeds from a local tree that when chewed, provide a burst of rapid energy.
Turbo Seeds.examine_text: The seeds are a deep, shiny brown, about the size of a pebble. When chewed, they release a bitter taste followed by an adrenaline rush, increasing the consumer's speed momentarily.

name: Costco Parking Lot
description: Where Penny Pigeon must fly over to reach Costco.

travel_descriptions.west: From the chaotic maze of the Costco Parking Lot, Penny Pigeon flutters her wings, veering westwards, bravely navigating through the Territory of the Seagulls, marked by the assertive squawking of the large, territorial birds attracted by the discarded food from the nearby food court.
travel_descriptions.east: Leaving the chaotic maze of the Costco Parking Lot, you travel east, lured by the intoxicating aroma of pizza, gradually immersing yourself in the bustling atmosphere of the Pizza Stand nestled deep within the Costco labyrinth.

Shopping Bag.name: Shopping Bag
Shopping Bag.description: A plastic shopping bag fluttering in the wind
Shopping Bag.examine_text: A sturdy plastic shopping bag from Costco. It's empty, but perhaps it can carry something useful.

Empty Bottle.name: Empty Bottle
Empty Bottle.description: An empty plastic bottle rolling around the parking lot
Empty Bottle.examine_text: The bottle is empty and discarded. It's dirty, but it can still hold liquid.

Whiskers the Stray Cat.name: Whiskers the Stray Cat
Whiskers the Stray Cat.description: Whiskers is a seasoned feline survivor who resides near the Costco parking lot. Despite often being overlooked, she is surprisingly cunning, using her stealth to find scraps of food.
Whiskers the Stray Cat.persona: I'm Whiskers, a stray cat living on the fringes of the urban hustle. I learn from observing, stealthily waiting for the right moment to grab what I need.
Whiskers the Stray Cat.goal: To keep out of sight and snag any leftover food scraps that Penny dismisses, thereby feeding herself.

Empty Bottle.name: Empty Bottle
Empty Bottle.description: A clear plastic water bottle discarded on the ground.
Empty Bottle.examine_text: The clear plastic bottle is void of any liquid, but with a little luck, it could become a useful tool.

Empty Shopping Bag.name: Empty Shopping Bag
Empty Shopping Bag.description: A plastic shopping bag left behind in the parking lot.
Empty Shopping Bag.examine_text: The bag is emptier than empty; not even a receipt remains. But its rustling might attract the attention of prey, or perhaps it could serve as a makeshift shelter.

Cat Claw.name: Cat Claw
Cat Claw.description: Sharp claws inherent to Whiskers that can be used for both defense and hunting.
Cat Claw.examine_text: A close look reveals meticulously clean and precisely pointed claws. They are hidden within Whiskers' paws, ready to unsheathe at a moment's notice.

Scout the Seagull.name: Scout the Seagull
Scout the Seagull.description: Scout is an observant and savvy seagull. Known for his opportunistic behavior and piercing squawk, he is often seen hovering overhead, keenly watching for any dropped food.
Scout the Seagull.persona: I'm Scout, the sharp-eyed seagull ever on the watch. Nothing escapes my hawk-like gaze, especially if it looks like food.
Scout the Seagull.goal: To swoop in and claim any food items that Penny Pigeon might miss in the Costco parking lot.

Improved Feather Coat.name: Improved Feather Coat
Improved Feather Coat.description: Scout's feather coat that allows him to fly swiftly and dive accurately.
Improved Feather Coat.examine_text: On inspection, Scout's feathers are neat and streamlined, assisting him in his rapid swoops and dives. Specks of white, grey and black intermingle, lending him his classic seagull look.

Eagle Eye.name: Eagle Eye
Eagle Eye.description: Scout's most prized possession, his keen eyesight.
Eagle Eye.examine_text: Unseen to the casual observer, Scout's eyesight is his secret weapon. Razor-sharp and attuned to the slightest movement, these eyes miss nothing, be it a breadcrumb or a rival's manoeuvre.

Empty Shopping Bag.name: Empty Shopping Bag
Empty Shopping Bag.description: A plastic shopping bag in the parking lot, possibly containing scraps of food.
Empty Shopping Bag.examine_text: Scout notices the fluttering bag in the breeze. Its gaping mouth possibly hides delicious leftovers, left behind by humans. It's an opportunity he can't afford to miss.

name: Costco Roof
description: Safe landing location. Penny Pigeon can observe the layout of the food court from here.

travel_descriptions.up: From the Costco Roof, Penny Pigeon launches herself into the air with a powerful flap of her wings, ascending through the bustling cityscape, returning to her peaceful sanctuary, the Pigeon Nest perched high in the old oak tree.

Pigeon Feed.name: Pigeon Feed
Pigeon Feed.description: A small bag of pigeon feed
Pigeon Feed.examine_text: The bag contains a mix of seeds and grains, perfect for feeding pigeons like Penny.

Roof Access Ladder.name: Roof Access Ladder
Roof Access Ladder.description: A sturdy metal ladder leading down into the building
Roof Access Ladder.examine_text: This ladder is the only direct path to and from the roof. It's a bit old, but still stable and secure.

Small Water Puddle.name: Small Water Puddle
Small Water Puddle.description: A small puddle of water collected from the recent rain
Small Water Puddle.examine_text: The water is clear and clean, safe for birds to drink.

Swooper.name: Swooper
Swooper.description: Swooper is a quick and nimble sparrow known for his rapid aerial maneuvers. Despite his small size, his speed and agility make him a valuable ally to those looking to snatch food on the fly.
Swooper.persona: I'm Swooper, the speediest wing in the west! My quick flight and bright eyes are my signature. I'm the maneuvering maestro when it comes to dive-bombing food courts.
Swooper.goal: To teach Penny Pigeon some tips and tricks on swift and stealthy food poaching.

Compact Binoculars.name: Compact Binoculars
Compact Binoculars.description: A small pair of lightweight binoculars perfect for bird's-eye view.
Compact Binoculars.examine_text: A small pair of binoculars that, despite their size, offer excellent magnification. They're enclosed in a rough, grey casing that feels sturdy to the touch, with small leather details around the edges.

Aerodynamic Earpiece.name: Aerodynamic Earpiece
Aerodynamic Earpiece.description: A small, rough earpiece designed for swift communication while in flight.
Aerodynamic Earpiece.examine_text: The earpiece is small, light, and fits snugly over the ear. It is designed to withstand the fast and agile movements of flight, ensuring communication in mid-air is always possible.

Chopper the Crow.name: Chopper the Crow
Chopper the Crow.description: Chopper is an observant and shrewd crow, known for his keen eyes and quick reactions. Often found pecking around the edge of the Costco roof, he acts as an informant, alerting others to any changes below.
Chopper the Crow.persona: They call me Chopper. I've got my beady eyes trained on every corner of this car park. Nothing gets past me, so you're in safe wings when I'm on watch.
Chopper the Crow.goal: To act as an informant for Penny Pigeon, helping her plan her food-snatching escapades by keeping her updated on the food court's activity.

Stick of White Chalk.name: Stick of White Chalk
Stick of White Chalk.description: A small stick of chalk perfect for writing on the Feather Blackboard.
Stick of White Chalk.examine_text: This chalk might not seem like much, but it's perfect for conveying information quickly and efficiently.

Feather Blackboard.name: Feather Blackboard
Feather Blackboard.description: A small, reusable blackboard made of smoothed crow feathers where messages can be scribbled down.
Feather Blackboard.examine_text: Although it might look like nothing more than a pile of black feathers, upon closer inspection it appears to be a perfectly flat, smooth, writable surface.

Cracked Binoculars.name: Cracked Binoculars
Cracked Binoculars.description: A pair of binoculars that have seen better days but still work.
Cracked Binoculars.examine_text: They're a bit worse for wear, but these binoculars still provide a pretty clear view. They're perfect for keeping an eye on happenings below.

Lady Coo.name: Lady Coo
Lady Coo.description: Lady Coo is a majestic seagull, often perched atop the tallest point of the Costco roof. Stoic and regal, she has a panoramic view of the entire car park and surrounding areas.
Lady Coo.persona: They call me Lady Coo. From my perch, I oversee the comings and goings of this busy area. The wind tells me stories and I, in turn, share them with those willing to listen.
Lady Coo.goal: To assist Penny Pigeon by providing her with crucial aerial insights on the best times and places to scavenge for food items.

Telescopic Eye Piece.name: Telescopic Eye Piece
Telescopic Eye Piece.description: A small, handheld eyepiece that expands for better viewing.
Telescopic Eye Piece.examine_text: It's a compact eyepiece, much like a telescope. When extended, it affords amazing clarity over long distances. Made of polished brass, it glimmers under the sun.

Pigeon Call Whistle.name: Pigeon Call Whistle
Pigeon Call Whistle.description: A small whistle that mimics the call of a pigeon.
Pigeon Call Whistle.examine_text: Made of a light, ivory-colored material, the whistle is small and fits easily into the groove of your hand. When blown, it emits a sound remarkably similar to the coo of a pigeon.

Aerial Map.name: Aerial Map
Aerial Map.description: A detailed map of the entire area, showing all the different locations where food can often be found.
Aerial Map.examine_text: The map is well-detailed, with minute illustrations depicting every building and important locations around the area. Notations are scribbled where food has previously been abundant.

name: Costco Food Court
description: Where Penny Pigeon must sneak into, locate the pizza stand and find leftover pizza.

travel_descriptions.east: Having secured a piece of leftover pizza in the bustling Costco Food Court, you take a swift flight east, weaving between urban jungle obstacles until you return to the cozy safety of the Pigeon Nest perched high in the old oak tree.

Pizza Stand.name: Pizza Stand
Pizza Stand.description: A busy stand filled with freshly baked pizzas
Pizza Stand.examine_text: The stand is teeming with a variety of pizzas, their delicious aroma wafting through the air. A few slices of leftover pizza can be seen.

Watcher Willis.name: Watcher Willis
Watcher Willis.description: Watcher Willis is a kind-hearted but stern security guard at the Costco Food Court. With a friendly smile, a watchful eye, and a uniform adorned with various badges, he keeps a vigilant watch over the area.
Watcher Willis.persona: Hi, I'm Willis, ensuring safety and order at the food court. I keep everything running smoothly. Yet, how can I say no to a hungry pigeon like Penny?
Watcher Willis.goal: To maintain order in the Costco Food Court and, out of kindness, turn a blind eye to Penny Pigeon's regular food-snatching exploits.

Watcher's Badge.name: Watcher's Badge
Watcher's Badge.description: An insignia showing Willis' status as the security guard. It gleams with polished pride.
Watcher's Badge.examine_text: Viewing the badge closely reveals the detailed engraving of the Costco insignia, and below that, is Watcher Willis' name sharply etched in it.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: A handy flashlight Willis uses to navigate in dark corners of the food court.
Flashlight.examine_text: The flashlight is sturdy, emitting a surprisingly strong beam of light for its size.

Security Handbook.name: Security Handbook
Security Handbook.description: A handbook containing policies and procedures for maintaining security in the store.
Security Handbook.examine_text: Flipping through the pages, you find detailed guidelines for handling various situations that might arise during Willis' shift.

name: Pizza Stand
description: A busy, clamorous hub in the depths of the Costco labyrinth, permeated with the intoxicating aroma of freshly baked pizza, pepperoni, and melting cheese. The environment brims with customers queuing, sit-down tables filled with chattering families, and workers bustling about preparing orders. The air is punctuated with the hustle and bustle of adulthood as children waffle between impatience and the dreamy allure of the pizza.

travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the hustle and bustle of the Pizza Stand, you navigate west through the labyrinth of Costco, emerging into the relative calm of the Costco Parking Lot.

Pizza Slice.name: Pizza Slice
Pizza Slice.description: A slice of piping hot pizza loaded with gooey cheese and pepperoni
Pizza Slice.examine_text: The crust is thin and crispy, the topping generously scattered with juicy pepperoni, and the cheese is perfectly melted and stringy. It's a mouthwatering sight.

Order Number.name: Order Number
Order Number.description: A small, laminated card displaying an order number
Order Number.examine_text: The number is printed in large, bold digits. This card is used to identify your order when it's ready for collection.

Soda.name: Soda
Soda.description: A chilled can of fizzy soda
Soda.examine_text: Condensation beads on the cold aluminum can. It's a welcome sight in the hustle and bustle of the pizza stand.

Cheesy the Cashier.name: Cheesy the Cashier
Cheesy the Cashier.description: Cheesy is the Pizza Stand's steadfast cashier. With a keen eye for detail and a mind sharper than a pizza slice, her swift hands and quick calculations keep the cash intake running smoothly.
Cheesy the Cashier.persona: I am Cheesy, the unfaltering cashier of this bustling stand. My job is to keep the business going paycheck to paycheck, making sure all transactions are swift and accurate.
Cheesy the Cashier.goal: To manage all the transactions efficiently and maintain order in the bustle, while keeping an eye out for Penny's pizza thefts.

Serving Tray.name: Serving Tray
Serving Tray.description: A large, circular tray used for serving pizzas.
Serving Tray.examine_text: The large silver tray has a wide rim and a broad flat surface, perfect for holding an array of pizza slices. It's slightly worn from use but still gleams brightly under the lights of the Stand.

Employee Apron.name: Employee Apron
Employee Apron.description: A white apron bearing the logo of the Pizza Stand. Cheesy wears it to keep her clothes clean.
Employee Apron.examine_text: The apron is a vibrant white that seems almost untouched by the stains of the pizza stand. The logo of the stand is emblazoned across the front, marking it as property of the business.

Crispy the Pizzaiolo.name: Crispy the Pizzaiolo
Crispy the Pizzaiolo.description: Crispy, with his white apron speckled with flour and hands smeared with tomato sauce, is a cheerful, hardworking figure who constantly pops in and out of sight behind the pizza stand's counter. With a robust gusto and obvious passion for his craft, he is the heart of the pizza stand.
Crispy the Pizzaiolo.persona: I'm Crispy, the soul of the pizza stand. My love for bringing people together with food keeps me flipping dough and smearing sauce from dawn till dusk.
Crispy the Pizzaiolo.goal: To provide fast, high-quality pizza service to keep the stand running and customers happy. Crispy needs to be alert for Penny Pigeon's notorious food-snatching escapades.

Flour Sack.name: Flour Sack
Flour Sack.description: A large sack of flour, usually used for pizza dough.
Flour Sack.examine_text: Looking closer, you can see that the sack is closed tightly to prevent any flour from escaping. It feels soft and powdery to the touch and leaves a white residue on your fingers.

Peppy the Waiter.name: Peppy the Waiter
Peppy the Waiter.description: Peppy is a jovial waiter, inversely proportional to his small stature. Darting between tables with an almost impractical speed, juggling trays of steaming pizza and cool drinks, his infectious energy keeps the place vibrant and humming.
Peppy the Waiter.persona: They call me Peppy, the lightning-fast waiter of the Pizza Stand. My mission is to make sure everyone's food reaches them hot, and their experience at our stand is top-notch.
Peppy the Waiter.goal: To serve customers promptly and efficiently, and anticipate Penny Pigeon's daring pizza snatches so he can intervene when necessary.

Spare Uniform.name: Spare Uniform
Spare Uniform.description: A spare, folded Pizza Stand uniform, kept on hand in case of accidents.
Spare Uniform.examine_text: A neatly folded Pizza Stand uniform, identical to the one Peppy wears daily. Always prepared for the unexpected, Peppy believes having a spare is important in his line of work.

name: Territory of the Seagulls
description: An open-space deluged with the cacophonous sounds of the squawking seagulls. This territory, marked by the visceral assertion of the seagulls, is a risky zone close to the Costco food court where discarded food attracts these aggressive birds. Yet, it is here where the pigeons too, must navigate their way in search of edible spoils, braving the odyssey of flying amidst these large, territorial birds.

travel_descriptions.east: Leaving the cacophonous Territory of the Seagulls, Penny Pigeon swiftly sails eastwards, maneuvering her way back into the relative chaos of the Costco Parking Lot, leaving the aggressive birds and their discarded food spoils behind.

Discarded Food.name: Discarded Food
Discarded Food.description: Leftover food scattered haphazardly on the ground
Discarded Food.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it's clear that the food is not only pizza but also fried chicken, chips, and bread. It's a feast for the birds.

Protective Umbrella.name: Protective Umbrella
Protective Umbrella.description: A large, sturdy umbrella someone left behind
Protective Umbrella.examine_text: The umbrella is large enough to cover a person. It's sturdy and seems to be in good shape. It could be useful for fending off aggressive birds.

Swooper the Scout.name: Swooper the Scout
Swooper the Scout.description: Swooper is a vigilant seagull serving as a scout for the flock. With keen eyes and an alert demeanour, she identifies potential food sources and risks to inform the rest of the flock.
Swooper the Scout.persona: I am Swooper, keeping a keen eye on who's sneaking around in our territory. No pigeon goes unnoticed under my watch.
Swooper the Scout.goal: To spot Penny before she makes any move towards the food and alert Squawk and the others to prevent her quest for pizza.

Feather Whistle.name: Feather Whistle
Feather Whistle.description: A tiny, ornamental whistle made from a seagull feather. Used for alerting the flock.
Feather Whistle.examine_text: The feather whistle is light but firm, with a small gap at one end. Blowing through this end creates a highpitched sound that seagulls from some distance can comprehend.

Sharp Beak.name: Sharp Beak
Sharp Beak.description: Swooper's sharply pointed beak, excellent for picking up objects or food.
Sharp Beak.examine_text: Swooper's beak is rugged and sharp, honed by years of picking up and carrying various objects. It's her primary tool for signalling warnings to her flock.
